title: How to unsubscribe from SkyShowtime (Poland)
description: Learn how to cancel your SkyShowtime subscription in Poland, whether you subscribed directly through their website or via the Google Play Store or App Store.

web.title: Cancel SkyShowtime Subscription via Website
web.description:
To cancel your SkyShowtime subscription via the website, follow these steps:

*   Go to the SkyShowtime website.
*   Log in to your SkyShowtime account.
*   Navigate to 'Plans and Payments'.
*   Select 'Cancel Subscription'.
*   Choose a reason for cancelling and click 'Continue'.
*   Confirm by clicking 'Cancel Plan'.
*   Check your email for a cancellation confirmation.

seo_text: Cancel SkyShowtime Poland subscription. Unsubscribe from SkyShowtime. SkyShowtime cancellation guide. Poland SkyShowtime subscription.
